channel.title: Community "RsDemon" Investigation (Client Included and Pictures)
channel.description:
I have currently started glancing through Chinese articles and/or forums for more information leading to who is developing and supporting the Chinese-based bot. Further findings will be updated within this topic, as well as further community findings leading to interesting subjects or conclusions.
[ul][*]Do not bring external arguments that do not have to do with the discussion of the Chinese Bot "RSdemon" into this thread. Off-topic argumentative discussions are a waste of precious investigative time, and will not be tolerated. [*]Do not disregard detrimental findings. [*]This thread is for educational purposes.[/ul]
Download Center: [u]Please NOTE: This client is the client provided by EazyGames. I have only performed one virus scan on this file that revealed no threats. This does not mean the file is entirely safe, open this at your own risk. I merely uploaded it to maintain faster download speeds.[/u] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=YT9ZHR4W](Megaupload)Runescape Demon Client[/url]
Current Progress Pictures: [IMG]http://i23.tinypic.com/33cad4y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i23.tinypic.com/2vv2jag.png[/img]
Current findings: [url=http://translate.google.com/translate?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.kapu.cn%2Fbbs%2Fviewthread.php%3Ftid%3D99&langpair=zh%7Cen&hl=EN&safe=off&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&prev=%2Flanguage_tools]Roughly Translated "Kapu" thread.[/url] [url=http://translate.google.com/translate?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwowgold.bot201.cn%2F%3Fm%3D200706%26paged%3D4&langpair=zh%7Cen&hl=EN&safe=off&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&prev=%2Flanguage_tools] Roughly Translated Gold Blog[/URL] [url=http://translate.google.com/translate?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.eazygame.com.cn%2Fse.asp%3Fnowmenuid%3D500002&langpair=zh%7Cen&hl=EN&safe=off&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&prev=%2Flanguage_tools]Roughly Translated EazyGame Website[/url] [url=http://translate.google.com/translate?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.eazygame.com.cn%2Fse.asp%3Fnowmenuid%3D500002&langpair=zh%7Cen&hl=en&ie=UTF8]Roughly Translated EazyGame Demon Run-through[/url]
I have registered on EazyGame and found a general downloads page and translated it. [u]NOTE: I have not downloaded any of this and I do not recommend anyone do so until efficiently scanned by a moderator or administrator:[/u] The official translated webpage can be found [url=http://translate.google.com/translate?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.eazygame.com.cn%2Fse.asp%3Fnowmenuid%3D500003&langpair=zh%7Cen&hl=en&ie=UTF8]here.[/url]
[Quote]Statement: game players operating companies for the use of auxiliary software provides the use of this software is likely with games running conflict with the provisions of the company. So because you may have been using the software game company Visa online account management. You must be responsible for their own behavior, the company does not undertake any responsible. Companies may be running game against the revised software games, such as causing some of the software functions can not use, we do not guarantee the duration of use, we can only of the software to be updated. Permanent commitment is not effective. From you accept this statement, in the course of the use of an anti - because the causes data loss or unable to run the software. We will not refund any of the action. Compensation depends on the situation. The above statement please users must carefully to see, if you choose to use this software, it means that you have to accept unconditionally the tools criteria. Otherwise, please withdraw from the software installation and use.
Agent software download
1. [url=http://eazygame.145.tofor.com/bk_ch.exe]The Chinese version of the download[/url] 2. [url=http://eazygame.145.tofor.com/bk_en.exe]Updates[/url] 3. [url=http://eazygame.145.tofor.com/vpn_en.exe]List of garbage characters to resolve server patches[/url]
Free download commonly used tools
1. [url=http://eazygame.145.tofor.com/RuneScape.rar]RuneScape window landers[/url] 2. [url=http://eazygame.145.tofor.com/%BA%B0%BB%B0%C6%F7.rar]RuneScape yelling at one another plug[/url] 3. [url=http://eazygame.145.tofor.com/%B0%EB%D7%D4%B6%AF%BA%B0%BB%B0%C6%F7.rar]RuneScape propaganda device[/url]
Plug-Related Downloads:
1. [url=http://7xshow.135.tofor.com/java.exe]JRE - 1_5_0_09[/url] 2. [url=http://7xshow.135.tofor.com/java-sp.rar]JRE patches (normal circumstances need not download)[/url] 3. [url=http://eazygame.145.tofor.com/rsdemon.rar]Plug[/url] 4. Plug the latest patches (Contact customer service) 5. Member of tree felling patches (Contact customer service) 6. Member line fishing for shrimp patch (Contact customer service)
DATA directory solutions to plug in to replace the original documents; Plug in the main program put on the line To document had been changed Desktop shortcuts rework what to delete the original EXE [/Quote]

item.title: Community "RsDemon" Investigation (Client Included and Pictures)
item.dc:creator: @WT-Fakawi WT-Fakawi
item.description:
@WT-Fakawi wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:8, topic:153381”]is this shit still around?[/quote] 50% of Runescape f2p’s population at daytime and 70-80% of nighttime f2p’s servers are filled with bots. I would happily assist you in a shocking tour through Draynor/Lumbridge/Port Sarim and all you will see around you are bots, 1000’s of them, on all f2p-world. The scope of this bot is amazing. It is far worse then back in the aryan days. And yes there have been many investigations in the past. It might be usefull as part of your investigation Crack Miners, to provide with a survey of previous findings of the “clientless” bot.

GJ,
Fawki

Read full topic

item.title: Community "RsDemon" Investigation (Client Included and Pictures)
item.dc:creator: @uncfan1119 uncfan1119
item.description:
@uncfan1119 wrote:

[quote=“Exception, post:9, topic:153381”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=209687.msg1838680#msg1838680 date=1193033948]
is this shit still around?
[/quote]
Unfortunately -.- These people have a bot that has been working for months…We’re getting beaten by an asian hack job.[/quote]

Its just the chinese language is hard to translate, or maybe the websites that are build around this thing allow chinese “internets” only? Sounds interesting though. I don’t understand why its called RSdemon, but the rest is in chinese. It should be like RSnihao?

[tt]Address0=http://www.ttmayi.cn/rs/
Address1=http://www.ttmayi.net/rs/[/tt]

Update urls?

Read full topic

item.title: Community "RsDemon" Investigation (Client Included and Pictures)
item.dc:creator: @Crack_Miners Crack Miners
item.description:
@Crack_Miners wrote:

I have finally gotten around to downloading the client and shifting through the entrails. The general client is under the Download Center section. Please note:

The client in the download center is still the client provided by EazyGames, I have in no way altered the client. I did scan the client with A-Squared and it showed no signs of being infected. Use these files at your own risk. It would also help if we could get people that were interest in the progression of this client in here that would actually be passionate towards the study.

Read full topic
